name: Shape of My Heart ~ Musical Calligraphy
description:
Musical Calligraphy is a visual transcript of the music into an abstract writing composition. The brushstroke flow comes from the practice of Chinese and Japanese cursive scripts.

This artwork encrypts Sting's "Shape of My Heart," shown as a transition between handwritten and AI processed versions. The artwork is composed in the shape of a Chinese character for "heart" (心).
